constituent: double, person, muzzle, vase, stand up, mouth
heisigStory: Person . . . muzzle. Do not confuse with the kanji for duplicate (Frame 504).
koohiiStory1: Mr. T keeps his double muzzled ... he wants all the glory.
koohiiStory2: Mr T, like many holywood stars, has a butt double who is used only for scenes where T´s buttocks are exposed (he has issues with bearing his behind). The butt double has no speaking parts - he is muzzled. Of course T himself isn´t he´s rambling on about pity and foo.
